meanings.definition: In a surprising or impressive manner.
meanings.sent1: She performed astonishingly well in the school play.
meanings.sent2: The magician's tricks were astonishingly good.
meanings.sent3: The cat looked astonishingly at the mouse toy.
meanings.sent4: The sun set astonishingly over the horizon.
meanings.sent5: The fireworks display was astonishingly beautiful.

meanings.sent1: He astonishingly completed the puzzle in record time.
meanings.sent2: The team astonishingly won the championship.
meanings.sent3: The cake was eaten astonishingly quickly at the party.
meanings.sent4: Her voice carried astonishingly far across the field.
meanings.sent5: The storm raged astonishingly throughout the night.
